topic: Workshop Enhanced Photon Mapping in RADIANCE - now online
body:
Dear colleagues,


the slides of our Workshop "Enhanced Photon Mapping in RADIANCE" at CC  
EASE are now online at:


https://www.researchgate.net/publication/277569984_Workshop_Enhanced_Photon_Mapping_in_RADIANCE


Note the audio for individual presentations is available in the  
supplementary resources below.


Thanks again for all who attended and presented. It was a successful  
workshop, and we're looking forward to welcoming you all again next year!




Best regards,


--Roland






Dr. Roland Schregle
Senior Research Associate


Lucerne University of Applied Sciences and Arts
School of Engineering and Architecture
CC Envelopes and Solar Energy (EASE)
www.hslu.ch/ccease


*** PLEASE NOTE OUR NEW CONTACT DETAILS
